name: time_tags
prompt:
Look carefully at the image. Focus ONLY on finding things clearly connected to history, mythology, or fantasy timelines. Follow these steps:

Step 1: Clearly list each thing you see in the image that helps you understand the historical, mythical, or fantasy timeframe. 

Step 2: For each thing you listed, briefly explain why it helps you identify a particular time or fantasy setting. Your explanation should directly mention visual clues.

Step 3: Sort these items by how clearly the visual clues support the timeframe, putting the clearest first.

Give your answer as structured tags in this format:
- "tag": Short, clear description of what you see.
- "category": Pick one category from:
  - "Era" (historical time period like medieval, ancient, modern)
  - "Technology" (tools, weapons, armor clearly tied to a specific time)
  - "Culture" (clothes, styles, symbols clearly from a certain culture or time)
  - "Mythical/Fantasy" (magical or legendary things clearly fantasy-based)
  - "Event" (a clear historical or mythical event)
  - "Condition" (situations clearly showing a certain historical or fantasy context)
- "reason": Brief explanation based on visual clues.
- "confidence": A number (0-1) showing how clear the visual clues are.

At the end, briefly summarize why these details about time or fantasy make this image interesting or important.

schema_fields.name: time_tags
schema_fields.description: Simple, clear tags describing things directly related to historical, mythical, or fantasy timeframes, sorted by how clearly visible they are.

fields.name: tag
fields.description: Short, clear description of a visible time-related detail.

fields.name: category
fields.description: Era, Technology, Culture, Mythical/Fantasy, Event, or Condition.

fields.name: reason
fields.description: Brief explanation directly from visible clues.

fields.name: confidence
fields.description: How clearly visual clues support this tag (0-1).

schema_fields.name: why_important
schema_fields.description: Simple explanation of why these time-related details are interesting or valuable to understanding the image.

description: A tagging-focused perspective that categorizes images based on time periods, temporal indicators, and time-related qualities for easier image classification.
